Description:
Detects scriptblock text keywords indicative of potential usge of the tool WinPwn. A tool for Windows and Active Directory reconnaissance and exploitation.


Author: Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: HackTool - WinPwn Execution - ScriptBlock
Query: sourcetype="windows-*" (scriptblocktext="*Offline_Winpwn*" OR scriptblocktext="*WinPwn *" OR scriptblocktext="*WinPwn.exe*" OR scriptblocktext="*WinPwn.ps1*")
